name: Bear Simulator
blurb: Explore, eat stuff, be a Bear!

rewards.reward: No Reward
NAME ON SITE: Have your name listed on the Bear Simulator site in a fancy backer section. [Read about all rewards in more detail on the main page]

GET THE GAME + MYSTERY KEY: A digital download of Bear Simulator or a Steam key if it gets on Steam. Also included is an exclusive code for a golden key to a mysterious shed found somewhere in the wilderness. All backers at this tier and above will find out what secret it holds when the game is launched. Just don't ask how a bear would manage to use a key. (Includes previous reward.)

BEAR SUNGLASSES: Get an exclusive code for totally rad sunglasses for your bear. They will give a darkened tint of the world and appear on your HUD which can be toggled on and off in a unique fashion. (Includes all previous rewards.)

BEAR BOOK + AMBIENT OST: Behind the scenes trivia, concepts and more about Bear Simulator await in the Bear Book, delivered as a PDF after the game's release. Also included will be the Ambient Soundtrack, a collection of each region's nature ambiance. (Includes all previous rewards.)

MYSTIC BEAR SKIN: Receive an exclusive mystical Mystic Skin code. Featuring white fur lined with glowing tattoos, every slash and swipe will leave a sparkly, magical trail in it's wake. (Includes all previous rewards.)

IN-GAME CREDIT + EARLY ACCESS: Be one of the first to play and test Bear Simulator! But that's not all, you'll also get your name credited in-game! This pledge and all above feature a unique in-game credit shown in brackets: [Backer Credit: Bear Disciple] (Includes all previous rewards.)

SQUIRREL BUDDY: Have a red squirrel buddy stick around your bear den who will randomly leave piles of acorns or other gifts at your doorstep. There will be other animal buddies you can befriend but the red squirrel is backer exclusive. [Backer Credit: Squirrel Owner] (Includes all previous rewards.)

BEAR PACK: A Bear Pack will be shipped to your residence. The pack will contain a  Mini-Poster of the title which I can sign, a collectable Bear Card and some stickers. [Backer Credit: Squirrel Owner] (Includes all previous rewards.)

STAR AS A ROCK: This is your chance to be a common rock loitering around Kickstarter Island that will have your name and you can give it a short description/quote. This reward and a few of the following rewards are a bit outlandish because they deal with Kickstarter Island, be sure to read about it on the main page. [Backer Credit: A Rock] (Includes all rewards from 60$ and below)

STAR AS A BUTTERFLY: Similar to the previous tier where you're a rock, this tier is all about those fluttering insects. Simply pick the color butterfly you want, give it a short description/quote and a name. [Backer Credit: A Butterfly] (Includes all rewards from 60$ and below)

ADOPT A TREE: The Kickstarter Island Park hosts a variety of different trees, take this chance to claim one which will be fenced off from the other unworthy trees. Choose the type of tree you want, title it and it will be honored with a plaque adorning your name. [Backer Credit: Friend of the Trees] (Includes all rewards from 60$ and below)

GET YOUR PHOTO IN: Submit a photo of you, a group of friends/family, your pet, anything really as long as it's a picture you took. This photo will then be used somewhere on Kickstarter Island. It might be made into a poster, a sign, a billboard, you won't know until the game is finished so you'll have to search to see how it's incorporated with the island. [Backer Credit: Photographer] (Includes all rewards from 60$ and below)

UNLEASH YOUR ART: There will be a Backer Museum on Kickstarter Island with several  blank canvases reserved for fine art. If you want to see one of your paintings, photographs, or maybe a drawing hanging up in this digital museum to be viewed by digital bears then this is your chance. Unless it's already digital art you would need to figure out how to upload it to internet though, scanning preferred. [Backer Credit: Artist] (Includes all rewards from 60$ and below)
POINTLESS GAME CASE: Since the game will be digitally distributed there really is no reason for a case but what's this!? A Game Case?! [Backer Credit: Squirrel Owner] (Includes all previous rewards.)

BE FEATURED ON THE  BEAR SIMULATOR WALK OF FAME: Pssh, that boring Hollywood Walk of Fame, who would want to be featured there when you have the superior Bear Simulator Walk of Fame. Claim your star on the regal sidewalk which will be found in the town area of Kickstarter Island. [Backer Credit: Super Star] (Includes all rewards from 60$ and below)

T-SHIRT + BEAR PACK + GAME CASE: Display the Bear Simulator logo and a mysterious bear symbol in shirt form. Plus the Bear Pack and game case. [Backer Credit: Fashionable] (Includes all previous rewards.)

PRINTED BEAR BOOK: You see that bear book explained there up at the 30$ tier? Pledge at this tier and you get that book printed out so you can read it somewhere you're not at a computer/phone/tablet. Plus the T-Shirt and Bear Pack. [Backer Credit: Literate] (Includes all rewards from 60$ and below)
A TOTEBAG: No pledge campaign is complete without a totebag, and man, will this ever be a totebag. [Backer Credit: Owns a Tote bag](Includes T-Shirt and all rewards from 85$ and below)

CARVE A TREE + PERSONALIZED PRINT: Virtually write something into one of the trees in Bear Simulator. Simply submit what you want etched in and which region you want the tree to be found in. Every tier above this will include a Personalized Print that's a fancy print of your creation/submission taken from in-game, framed, then sent to you. [Backer Credit: Ruined Nature] (Includes T-Shirt, Bear Pack and all rewards from 60$ and below)

TOTEBAG + PRINTED BEAR BOOK + T-SHIRT + GAME CASE + BEAR PACK: With this pledge you get a pack of all the physical items offered so far. [Backer Credit: Owns a Tote bag] (Includes all rewards from 60$ and below)

SPOOKY PORTRAIT + PERSONALIZED PRINT: Wandering around at night, you may come across a cabin in the woods with 8 creepy portraits adorning the walls. Become one of those portraits! Submit a photo of yourself in a regal pose and it'll be photoshopped to look all \u201coil-painty\u201d then digitally framed to hang on the cabin wall. [Backer Credit: Eerie Portrait] (Includes T-Shirt, Bear Pack and all rewards from 60$ and below)

SPOOKY CONTRIBUTE + PERSONALIZED PRINT: There's a terrifying forest in Bear Simulator but it could be a little more frightening. Contribute a spooky idea and see it come to life in the game's scary region. Just think of your idea as a set piece or decoration, so it can't affect the player and you're good to go. [Backer Credit: Master of Horror] (Includes T-Shirt, Bear Pack and all rewards from 60$ and below)

DESIGN AN OFFICIAL EDIBLE + PERSONALIZED PRINT: Design a food to be found in Bear Simulator. You'll be given a form to fill out where you'll describe what it is, where it's found, what it looks like, what stats it will give and finally name it. Example: Let's say you want an "Aqua Mushroom", which would be found around lakes and increase your swimming stat when eaten. Something like that. [Backer Credit: Bear Chef] (Includes T-Shirt, Bear Pack and all rewards from 60$ and below)
